meanings.definition: Enrolls (verb): to officially register or sign up for something
meanings.sent1: She enrolls in the art class to learn how to paint.
meanings.sent2: He enrolls in the gym to start working out regularly.
meanings.sent3: The cat enrolls in the mouse-catching training program.
meanings.sent4: His determination enrolls him in the path to success.
meanings.sent5: Enrolling in the cooking course enlivens her passion for food.

meanings.definition: Enrolls (noun): the act of registering or signing up for something
meanings.sent1: The enrollment for the workshop is open to all students.
meanings.sent2: After the enrolls, the students received their class schedules.
meanings.sent3: The sudden increase in enrolls surprised the organizers.
meanings.sent4: The enrolls for the event exceeded all expectations.
meanings.sent5: Her quick enrolls secured her a spot in the competition.
